sources.title: Ninja Death Trilogy
sources.description: All 3 Ninja Death Movies in RMVB and xvid AVI file formats. WARNING These films have some not-so-safe-for-work scenes (it's a trilogy about dueling brothels, what do you expect?) AVI's are encoded in xvid with 1200 Video Bit Rate and MP3 320 Bit Rate Audio Summary From IMDB: Tiger is the owner of a brothel who moonlights as a Kung Fu artist under the watchful eye of "Master." They run into serious trouble when ninjas inexplicably show up and jeopardize Tiger's prostitution ring. IMDB Link Video Specs Ninja Death I - Frame Size: 416x320, AVI File Size: 824 MB, RMVB File Size: 327 MB Ninja Death II - Frame Size: 384x304, AVI File Size: 842 MB, RMVB File Size: 330 MB Ninja Death III - Frame Size: 400x304, AVI File Size: 826 MB, RMVB File Size: 329 MB **NOTE** All AVI's are derived from RMVB's (In other words, I re-encoded so that Archive.org could re-encode my files to OGV and MP4)
